parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.48</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Object Detection </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of all units controlled by ''connected clients'' - human players including dead players, but also [[Arma 3 Headless Client|Headless Clients]].<br>
Use [[BIS_fnc_listPlayers]] or see '''[[#Examples|Example 1]]''' to get human players only.

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>
* In a player-hosted game, the complete array of [[allPlayers]] may get delayed on mission start. Use [[BIS_fnc_listPlayers]] if you need it earlier.
* The order of players in the return array may differ from server to clients. </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[allPlayers]] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Get only human players:
<code>[[private]] _headlessClients = [[entities]] "HeadlessClient_F";
[[private]] _humanPlayers = [[allPlayers]] - _headlessClients;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>{
	[[systemChat]] [[format]] [
		"Player %1 is %2", 
		[[name]] _x, 
		["dead", "alive"] [[select]] [[alive]] _x
	];
} [[forEach]] [[allPlayers]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _bluNums = [[west]] [[countSide]] [[allPlayers]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[allCurators]], [[allGroups]], [[allDead]], [[allUnits]], [[switchableUnits]], [[playableUnits]], [[vehicles]], [[allUnitsUAV]], [[allDeadMen]], [[isPlayer]], [[playersNumber]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 
</value></part></template>
